title: Title
timeout_warn: $botname warns you to wait at least 2 seconds before running the next command.
cant_enter_vc: $botname could not enter your voice chat. This is illegal. We will take action.
already_in_vc: $botname Radio is already in your voice channel.
no_vc: To use $botname Radio, please connect to a voice channel first.
play_empty_query: Don't play with $botname. What is that you want to listen to?
play_fetching_query: $botname is sending it's hawks to fetch your audio...
play_platform_not_supported: It seems $botname is not ready to process those URLs as of now. Try a different platform!
play_failed_query: $botname sent out it's fastest eagles, but could not get your audio back. Try again!
play_failed_error: WOAH! $botname had a tough time trying to play your audio. Try again!
play_ig_not_video: $botname found the Instagram link is not a video or Reel. Please use a different link.
action_pause: $botname paused the current audio in it's radio station.
action_pause_empty: $botname's radio station has nothing to pause!
action_resume: $botname has resumed playing on it's radio station!
action_resume_empty: $botname has got nothing to resume in it's radio station.
action_skip: $botname skipped a song. It seems you didn't like it.
action_skip_empty: $botname has nothing to skip! The queue is currently empty.
action_clear: Cleared all requests from $botname's Radio Station.
action_stop: $botname's Radio Station will stop for today sadly.
queue_empty: $botname radio station is currently waiting for new requests. Send one!
no_content_found: No video content was found for the url
queue_pos_removed: Audio was removed in the queue at position
now_empty: $botname's radio isn't playing anything right now. Submit a request now with ***$botname play***!
invite_zero: Invite uses cannot be less than 1.
purge_amount: You must specify the number of messages to purge.
doujin_not_in_source: We couldn't find your doujin in our sources, but here's the official link:
doujin_no_sauce: You didn't specify the sauce. Did you want ketchup?
doujin_unknown_opt: Unknown option. Use ***-s*** for a specific doujin.
ai_init_message:
You are helpful assistant in charge of helping people in this chat. Their names will be sent before each query such as '{name}: {query}'. Make sure to address the correct sender each time and use the same language of the query.

If you understand, continue with this first message as if it was a casual conversation:
ai_init_error: There was an error initializing the AI. Please try again.
ai_not_ready: The AI is not ready yet. Please wait a few seconds and try again.
ai_error: There was an error processing the message. Please try again.
ai_chat_close_error: There was an error closing the chat. Please try again.
ai_chat_closed_not_found: There was no chat to close.

general.description:
All available command categories provided by $botname.
Use '$prefix [category]' to see all commands from that category.
general.music: Play music through your voice chats!
general.doujin: Search available doujins from our sources.

music.title: Music Commands [aliases]
music.description: Available commands to control $botname's Radio Station.
music.play: Play audio through $botname's most famous radio station.
music.resume: Resume the audio frozen in $botname's radio station.
music.skip: Skip that one song you don't like from $botname's radio station.
music.queue: [q] Display $botname's radio station pending play requests.
music.clear: Removes every current request from $botname's radio station.
music.leave: [stop] Make $botname's Radio Station stop for the day.
music.now: Display the radio's currently playing song.
music.unloop: Disables looping for the currently playing song.
music.jump: Jumps to X position in queue.

doujin.title: Doujin Commands
doujin.doujin: Displays a random doujin from our sources.
doujin.arg_sauce: Specifies a sauce to look for within our sources.

ai.title: AI Commands
ai.description: Commands to interact with the AI.
ai.@mentionme!: Mention me in your message to start/continue a public conversation with other users.
ai.ask: Starts a one-to-one conversation with the AI.
ai.aireset: Closes the current one-to-one conversation with the AI.
ai.commonreset: Closes the current common conversation with the AI.
